title: Does the Google Pixel use Cross Hair Technology for Facial Recognition like Lasers & Levels?
content: Does the Google Pixel use Cross Hair Technology for Facial Recognition, & land mapping navigation, like Lasers & Levels for aligning & terrain adjustment like military GPS surveyors, when the engineers are building roads, & taking sea level measurements?  If not, I would like to request that all be added to the Google Pixel! Wouldn't it be cool to do surveying equipment, & land navigation with the Google Pixel, like an all in one tool?
